description.zh-cn: 美国陆军五星上将
description.en: American five-star general

description.zh-cn: 道格拉斯·麦克阿瑟的父亲，美国陆军中将
description.en: Father of Douglas MacArthur, United States Army lieutenant general

description.zh-cn: 美国第33任总统
description.en: 33rd President of the United States

nodes.id: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

zh-cn: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 美国第32任总统
description.en: 32nd President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国第31任总统
description.en: 31st President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军上将
description.en: United States Army general

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军五星上将，美国第34任总统
description.en: American five-star general and 34th President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 日本第124代天皇
description.en: 124th Emperor of Japan

description.zh-cn: 美国远征军司令
description.en: Commander of the American Expeditionary Forces

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在韩战中派遣的武装力量
description.en: The armed forces deployed by the People's Republic of China during the Korean War

en: Chief of Staff of the United States Army

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军军职最高的职位
description.en: The highest-ranking military office in the United States Army

en: Supreme Commander for the Allied Powers

description.zh-cn: 二战后负责占领日本的盟军指挥机构
description.en: The Allied command structure responsible for the occupation of Japan after World War II

description.zh-cn: 在韩战期间由联合国授权成立的多国部队
description.en: The multinational military force established under the authority of the United Nations during the Korean War

description.zh-cn: 一战退伍老兵在华盛顿进行的请愿示威活动
description.en: A protest march by World War I veterans in Washington, D.C.

description.zh-cn: 韩战期间联合国军的一次关键两栖登陆作战
description.en: A key amphibious invasion by United Nations forces during the Korean War

nodes.id: 杜鲁门总统解职道格拉斯·麦克阿瑟

zh-cn: 杜鲁门总统解职道格拉斯·麦克阿瑟

description.zh-cn: 杜鲁门总统因政策分歧解除麦克阿瑟在远东所有职务的事件
description.en: The event where President Truman relieved MacArthur of all his commands in the Far East due to policy disagreements

description.zh-cn: 小亚瑟·麦克阿瑟是道格拉斯·麦克阿瑟的父亲。
description.en: Arthur MacArthur Jr. was the father of Douglas MacArthur.

description.zh-cn: 在胡佛总统任期内担任美国陆军参谋长。
description.en: Served as Chief of Staff of the United States Army during President Hoover's term.

relationships.target: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 在罗斯福总统任期内担任美国陆军参谋长和二战指挥官。
description.en: Served as Chief of Staff of the United States Army and a commander in World War II during President Roosevelt's term.

description.zh-cn: 在杜鲁门总统任期内担任驻日盟军总司令和联合国军总司令。
description.en: Served as Supreme Commander for the Allied Powers and UN Commander during President Truman's term.

description.zh-cn: 在韩战战略上与杜鲁门总统存在严重分歧，并公然反对其政策，最终导致被解职。
description.en: Had serious disagreements with President Truman over Korean War strategy, openly opposing his policies, which led to his dismissal.

description.zh-cn: 1903年以第一名的成绩毕业于西点军校。
description.en: Graduated first in his class from West Point in 1903.

description.zh-cn: 担任西点军校校长并推行了一系列改革。
description.en: Served as Superintendent of West Point and implemented a series of reforms.

position.en: Supreme Commander for the Allied Powers

description.zh-cn: 在胡佛总统命令下，指挥军队暴力驱逐了在华盛顿抗议的退伍军人。
description.en: Under President Hoover's orders, he commanded troops to forcibly disperse protesting veterans in Washington.

description.zh-cn: 不顾高层普遍反对，坚决策划并执行了仁川登陆，扭转了韩战局势。
description.en: Despite widespread opposition from high command, he planned and executed the Incheon Landing, turning the tide of the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军入朝作战，在清川江战役和长津湖战役中击败了麦克阿瑟指挥的联合国军，迫使其大规模撤退。
description.en: The Chinese People's Volunteer Army entered the Korean War and defeated the UN forces under MacArthur's command in the Battle of the Ch'ongch'on River and the Battle of Chosin Reservoir, forcing a major retreat.

relationships.source: 杜鲁门总统解职道格拉斯·麦克阿瑟

description.zh-cn: 杜鲁门总统解除了麦克阿瑟在远东的所有职务，结束了他的军事生涯。
description.en: President Truman relieved MacArthur of all his commands in the Far East, ending his military career.

description.zh-cn: 作为驻日盟军总司令，主导了日本的战后民主化和非军事化改革。
description.en: As Supreme Commander for the Allied Powers, he led the post-war democratization and demilitarization reforms of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 在战后占领期间，决定保留天皇制并保护昭和天皇免于被起诉为战犯，以利于稳定统治日本。
description.en: During the post-war occupation, he decided to retain the imperial system and protect Emperor Shōwa from being prosecuted as a war criminal to facilitate the stable governance of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 曾长期担任麦克阿瑟的副官。
description.en: Served as MacArthur's aide for an extended period.

description.zh-cn: 接任第8军团司令，在麦克阿瑟指挥下作战，后接替其联合国军总司令职务。
description.en: Took command of the Eighth Army, fighting under MacArthur's overall command, and later succeeded him as UN Commander.

description.zh-cn: 在一战期间，麦克阿瑟因越级抗议而得罪了远征军司令潘兴，由此结怨。
description.en: During World War I, MacArthur offended AEF Commander Pershing by protesting over his head, creating a lasting enmity.
